GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.10.155
GSD.description:
udf: Fix a slab-out-of-bounds write bug in udf_find_entry()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.155 by commit 03f9582a6a2ebd25a440896475c968428c4b63e7, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 066b9cded00b8e3212df74a417bb074f3f3a1fe0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: udf: Fix a slab-out-of-bounds write bug in udf_find_entry()
